name: Weather Witch (Aya Oikawa)
description:
"It's a bright day outside, how awful..."

Help the young witch change the bright sky outside. Change the different frames to find the match that will bring the rainy day that the witch desires.
And who knows, maybe there are other options as well...

Controls
Right click on mouse

Bezalel Academy of Arts & Designs
Art & Interaction course, guided by Dani Bacon and Rutu Modan
